Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Galeon Playa in Teguise (Costa Teguise), you'll be close to Las Cucharas Beach and Costa Teguise Golf Club. This family-friendly apartment is within the vicinity of Cesar Manrique Foundation and Sports City of Lanzarote.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 175 guestrooms, featuring kitchens with refrigerators and microwaves. Rooms have private balconies. Cable television is provided for your entertainment. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and separate sitting areas.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Dip into one of the 4 outdoor swimming pools or enjoy other recreational amenities, which include bicycles to rent. Additional features include wireless Internet access (surcharge), concierge services, and babysitting/childcare.

Dining
You can enjoy a meal at a restaurant serving the guests of Galeon Playa, or stop in at a snack bar/deli. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar. Breakfast is available for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include high-speed (wired) Internet access (surcharge), dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. A roundtrip airport shuttle is available for a surcharge.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 4 PM Check-out time is noon
You can enjoy a meal at a restaurant serving the guests of Galeon Playa, or stop in at a snack bar/deli. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar. Breakfast is available for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

With a stay at Galeon Playa in Teguise (Costa Teguise), you'll be close to Las Cucharas Beach and Costa Teguise Golf Club. This family-friendly apartment is within the vicinity of Cesar Manrique Foundation and Sports City of Lanzarote.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Las Cucharas Beach - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Costa Teguise Golf Club - 3.6 km / 2.2 mi
Cesar Manrique Foundation - 5.8 km / 3.6 mi
Sports City of Lanzarote - 7.1 km / 4.4 mi
Centro Asociado de la UNED de Lanzarote - 7.2 km / 4.5 mi
Santa Barbara Castle - 9.2 km / 5.7 mi
Cactus Garden - 9.7 km / 6 mi
Deiland Shopping Center - 10.4 km / 6.4 mi
Pocillos Beach - 15.9 km / 9.9 mi
Rancho Texas Park - 16.8 km / 10.4 mi
Lanzarote Golf Resort - 17.1 km / 10.6 mi
Puerto del Carmen Beach - 18.8 km / 11.7 mi
Jameos del Agua - 19 km / 11.8 mi
Cueva de los Verdes - 19.2 km / 11.9 mi
Guinate Animal Park - 22.4 km / 13.9 mi

The preferred airport for Galeon Playa is Arrecife (ACE-Lanzarote) - 12.6 km / 7.8 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.
